verbose_text: On the opposite, in a large study of 279 patients with colon cancer and 293 patients with rectal cancer, Tominaga et al [XREF_BIBR] found that, although higher preoperative CEA level group tended to have a higher recurrence rate, preoperative CEA level was not statistically related to the prognosis of both groups of patients (Hazard ratio 1.34 and 1.35).
